content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I’m here to help you schedule your HVAC service appointment. May I have your name, please?
Thanks, Mike! Could you please provide your address so I can check our service area?
Thank you, Mike. Let me verify if we cover your area.
Great news! We do provide service in your area. When would be the ideal time for our technician to visit?
I’m not really sure yet. I want to get quotes from a couple of other companies first before I commit to a date.
I understand, Mike. It’s always smart to compare options. If you decide to schedule with us, feel free to reach out anytime. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
reason: Customer wants to get quotes from other companies before scheduling
